### Prevalence {.tabset}

```{r reg-prevalence}
dim.id <- which(names(dimnames(prevalence)) == "date")
ndate.data <- lubridate::as_date(date.data) - start.date + 1
prev_plot <- R.utils::extract(prevalence, indices = list(start.prev:ndate.data), dims = dim.id)
if (!exists("prev.dat")) {
  prev_scenario_name <- paste0("PrevINLACevik_cm4ons_IFR3bp_", region.type,
	"60cutoff_25wk2_prev14_skip5Nick_matrices_20210423_deaths")
  prev_tmp_path <- file.path(out.dir, "..", prev_scenario_name, "output_matrices.RData")
  if (file.exists(prev_dat_path)) {
    prev_env <- new.env()
    load(prev_tmp_path, env = prev_env)
    prev.dat <- prev_env$prev.dat
    rm(prev_env)
  }
}
if (exists("prev.dat")) {
  prev.dat.plot <- prev.dat %>%
    filter(lsd > 0) %>%
    mutate(value = exp(lmean), date = sample_date)
} else {
  prev.dat.plot <- NULL
}
```


#### By region
```{r reg-medterm-prev}
make.plots(prevalence, by = "region", x.label = "Date", project.forwards = TRUE, data = prev.dat.plot)
```

#### By age
```{r age-medterm-prev}
make.plots(prevalence, by = "age", x.label = "Date", project.forwards = TRUE, data = prev.dat.plot)
```
